quoteText: COMPANY MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT RED POCKET MOBILE SERVICES WILL (i) MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, (ii) ALLOW ACCESS TO ALL THIRD PARTY SITES, OR (iii) BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE OR ERROR FREE.
title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
tosdr.tldr:
From the Terms of Service
I.A "Company does not guarantee uninterrupted service."
III.B "We do not guarantee delivery of messages and reserves the right to change this offer as needed without notification."
H.I "COMPANY MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT RED POCKET MOBILE SERVICES WILL (i) MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, (ii) ALLOW ACCESS TO ALL THIRD PARTY SITES, OR (iii) BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE OR ERROR FREE"
